articles.title: Countering climate change with cool pavements - Phys.org
articles.description: Pavements are an abundant urban surface, covering around 40 percent of American cities. But in addition to carrying traffic, they can also emit heat.
articles.content:

articles.description: Major American buyout group Apollo, which missed out on the takeover of Asda last year, is thought to be among the firms eyeing up Sainsbury's, according to reports.
